data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 103,800 souls living in the state of Hîncesti with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hîncesti, Moldova
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Hîncesti, Moldova.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 21 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Hîncesti, Moldova that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, encourage your church in Hîncesti that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Hîncesti, Moldova to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 4,793 believers in Hîncesti to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Hîncesti, Moldova so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hîncesti, Moldova has a population of 103,800.

We estimate Hîncesti has 4,793 people who might know Jesus, 73,554 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 25,452 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.
